alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 10:56PM EDT until further notice by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 PM EDT Friday was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 2.7 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.0 feet on 07/14/1975. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 5.5 7.9 Fri 10 pm ED 3.6 2.8 2.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 800 AM EDT.
